resources.string: Don\'t have an account ? Sign Up

Common Symptoms of Covid-19 includes respiratory symptoms,fever,cough,shortness of breath, etc. In more severe cases, the infection can cause severe respiratory syndromes,kidney failure and other major causes.
Your Asssessment is going on.Do you want to cancel your self assessment?

While using GoCorona App, some of the information that is personal could be collected from the resources about you. We will surely protected in order to secure the app while safeguarding your privacy as per which the details that is the personal information of the user that has been collected will be security kept. During the registration process there are some terms and policies for the privacy that have to accepted by the user. The use of the app signifies that the user has accepted the terms and conditions of the app.

a. While registering on the app some of the information that will be collected and security kept on the server is as follows name, phone number, age,profession etc.
 b. The App will ask for the access to your contacts in case user have to call ambulance for emergency purposes.
 c. The App will use your current location as to provide you the location of the nearby hospitals.
 d. There is a need to complete a self assessment test on the app that will collect the location data as well as uploaded on the server along with the results of the self assessment that would judge whether a person is suffering from covid or not.

a. As a registered user, you have the right to access your profile at any time to add, remove or modify any registration information that you have supplied.\n b. You cannot manage the communications that you receive from us or how you receive them.\n

The App is equipped with standard security features to protect the confidentiality and security of your information. Personal information provided at the time of registration is encrypted before being uploaded to the cloud where it is stored in a secure encrypted server. Personal information that is stored in the Apps of other registered users that you come in contact with is securely encrypted and are incapable of being accessed by such user.

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Are you experiencing any of the following symptoms
Have you ever had any of the following
Have you done any of the following in the last 28-45 days
Have you avoided any of the below in public places

string-array.name: optionBList
string-array.item: Dry Cough or lack of taste
Met anyone who came from foreign country

string-array.name: optionCList
string-array.item: Met anyone who later on gets COVID positive

resources.string: Feeling any of the above symptoms?

Your infection risk is low.We recommend you to stay at home to avoid any chance of getting Novel Coronavirus.\n Retake self Assessment.If you develop any symptoms or come in contact with any of the COVID-19 patient

According to your self assessment test, you may have been infected by Novel Coronavirus. So go to the hospital immediately following all the necessary measures and get it tested.\n Before your result come, keep yourself isolated and dont go outside.

According to your self assessment test, it is highly sure that you have been infected by Novel Coronavirus. So isolate yourself and go to nearby hosptal and get it tested.\n Till then Avoid contact and follow all the precautions and measures which you will be given by the hospital
Be a responsible citizen and provide accurate answers in this assessment test. This test will help you to know your current condition.
